task.title: Javier catch the bus to class ya bum
task.shortdesc: The bus is the only transportation to campus for Javier.

taskbody.context: Javier will need to be on his game to catch the bus and make it to campus.

step.cmd: Go outside 5 minutes before the listed time for the bus arrival.
Ensure you are catching the right bus, look for MSS
Present your Hokie Passport to the driver to gain entry to the bus.
Ride the bus to your appropriate spot in front of squires and exit to walk to class.
